DOC.brief_summary: Medication errors are common in intensive care (Valentin A et al., BMJ. 2009;338). Standardized color coded labels for user applied syringes enjoy strong support from many health professionals, thinking that this might increase patient safety. Whether this is true or not warrants further research.
DOC.brief_title: Questionnaire of the Section Perioperative Intensive Care of the European Society of Intensive Care Medicine (ESICM) on Standardized Drug Labelling
